about.title: Professionals in creating modern websites
about.subtitle: About us
about.description: We are a team of creative professionals combining a passion for design with modern technologies. We offer comprehensive services from design to implementation and technical support.

items.question: What is a web studio, and what services does it offer?
items.answer: A web studio is a company specializing in designing and developing websites tailored to individual client needs.

items.question: How to choose the right web studio for my project?
items.answer: Choosing the right studio depends on its experience, client reviews, portfolio, and pricing.

items.question: What is the process of website development in your studio?
items.answer: The process includes analysis, design, implementation, and testing.

items.question: How long does it take to create a website?
items.answer: The timeline depends on the complexity of the project, ranging from 1 to 8 weeks.

items.question: What technologies do you use for website development?
items.answer: We use modern technologies such as HTML, CSS, MERN (MongoDB, Express, React, Node), Next.js, and others.
